full_summary:
### ITQ - Water Supply Upgrades - Digby Ferry Terminal
----------------------------------------

**Reference:** WS4036001725-Doc4036110289
**Amendment Number:** 0
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-01
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-20T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-10

**Notice:** Invitation to Qualify

**Bid Period:** Exclusive of innovation and collaborative innovation

### **Notice for Commercial Agreement for Water Supply System Upgrades**

**Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)**, on behalf of Transport Canada, invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the upgrade to the water supply system at the Digby Ferry Terminal.

**Expected Contract Value:** Between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000

**Description of the Work:** Demolition of existing water supply system and installation of new potable water system, including new drilled well, water treatment system, water lines, etc. The project aims to improve the reliability and efficiency of the water supply system at the Digby Ferry Terminal.

**Period for Completion:** The project is expected to be completed by March 31, 2024.

**Scope of Work:** This is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase tendering process. Phase One aims to evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers. Phase Two will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project.

**Evaluation Criteria:** Qualified contractors will be selected based on their ability to deliver the project on time and within budget.

**Prequalification Phase:** Limited number of qualified contractors will be selected for the financial bid phase. Purchaser reserves the right to modify the quantities of work on the tender.

### **Bid Submittal Requirements:**

*   Bids must be submitted via SAP Ariba by the deadline date and time.
*   Bids may be submitted in both official languages of Canada (English or French).

Online Submissions:

*   Submission must be uploaded to the designated account by the deadline date and time.

For further information regarding this ITQ, please refer to the attached documents. Services in English are available from the RFP issuing office.

No Pre-Submissions:

*   Supplers/Precursors are asked not to proceed. Purchaser reserves the right to cancel the ITQ at any time.

**For Further Information Please Contact:**
Rachel Miller (SPAC/PSPC), at rachel.miller@
